name: Di Yao 0001
content: Di Yao @ ICT,CAS×Di Yao(å§è¿ª)Associate Professor @ ICT, CASNo.6 Kexueyuan South Road, Beijing, China, 100190yaodi AT ict DOT ac DOT cn[Bio]    [Google Scholar]    [Github]BackgroundAboutAboutI am currently an associate professor in Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences(ICT, CAS). Before joining ICT, I obtained my Ph.D. degree in University of Chinese Academy of Sciences supervised by Prof. Jingping Bi. The thesis is avaliable HERE. Previously I conducted one year visiting at DMAL, Nanyang Technological University under the supervision of Prof. Gao Cong. My research interest lies in time series analysis, anomaly detection and causal discovery . I am looking for highly-motivated students to work with me. If interested, please drop me a message by email. NewsNews[2025. 02] We have released a benchmark to assess the abality of LLM for spatio-temporal analysis. The work is accepted by WWW 2025 Resource Track! [2024. 12] One paper about flight trajectory representation has been accepted by AAAI 2025! [2024. 10] My research proposal about causal mixture marketing model has been approved by Alibaba AIR Program. [2024. 09] Our work about anomlay detction for dynamic graph with LLM has been accepted by ICDM 2024! [2024. 08] I am delighted to receive funding from the NSFC for the topic 'Trajectory Intention Prediction'! [2024. 07] I am very pleased to collaborate once again with DiDi Chuxing on the project focused on trip risk estimation. [2024. 02]Two papers about trajectory data mining have been accepted in ICDE 2024! [2023. 12]One paper about causal discovery for marketing mix modeling has been accepted in WSDM 2024!
